allExperience.companyDescription: During my time at DigiTaluq, I build smooth, high-performance websites primarily using Shopify, WordPress, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js and Next js. I focus on creating responsive designs, optimizing SEO for better visibility, and delivering seamless user experiences that help businesses grow online.

At DigiTaluq, I work as a Full-Stack Developer, building scalable and high-performance web applications. My role involves developing dynamic front-end experiences using React and Next.js, creating secure and efficient back-end APIs with Node.js and databases, and integrating AI solutions to enhance automation and user experience. Additionally, I focus on optimizing website performance and implementing SEO strategies to improve visibility. My goal is to craft modern web solutions that drive business success and deliver seamless digital experiences.

As a Freelance Developer, I have hands-on experience working on diverse projects across various domains. I have successfully delivered custom web applications,  e-commerce platforms, and SEO-optimized websites for clients. My projects come from local businesses, market referrals, and professional networks, allowing me to work on unique challenges and deliver tailored solutions. With expertise in React, Next.js, Node.js, database management, Wordpress and Shopify, I help businesses establish a strong digital presence and optimize their online operations.

As a Freelance Developer, I have hands-on experience working on diverse projects across various domains. I have successfully delivered custom web applications, AI-powered solutions, e-commerce platforms, and SEO-optimized websites for clients. My projects come from local businesses, market referrals, and professional networks, allowing me to work on unique challenges and deliver tailored solutions. With expertise in React, Next.js, Node.js, database management, AI integrations, and Shopify/WooCommerce, I help businesses establish a strong digital presence and optimize their online operations.

I began my professional career at Daira Engineering, where I gained hands-on experience in modern web development. During my time there, I worked extensively with React and Tailwind CSS, building dynamic and responsive user interfaces. It was at Daira Engineering that I first explored Next.js and Node.js, deepening my understanding of full-stack development. This experience laid the foundation for my expertise in creating scalable web applications and integrating efficient front-end and back-end technologies.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Usman built my UAE-based eCommerce store on Shopify, and Iâ€™m extremely happy with the results. He was professional, detail-oriented, and made the entire process seamless. His expertise in web development ensured a smooth, functional, and visually appealing store. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a skilled and reliable developer.

I've known Muhammad Usman for a long time, and his passion for technology is truly inspiring. He has exceptional skills in Next.js, Supabase, and Generative AI integration for web applications, always staying ahead of the curve. Beyond his technical expertise, heâ€™s deeply involved in AWS community events, constantly learning and sharing his knowledge. His creative mindset and dedication to innovation make him a valuable asset. I highly recommend him for any role that requires a skilled and forward-thinking developer.

I've had the pleasure of working with Usman on multiple projects at DigitalUQ, and his technical expertise is truly outstanding. He has a deep understanding of Next.js, React.js, Supabase, and Node.js, along with strong experience in CMS development and AI model integration. His problem-solving skills and ability to build scalable, high-performance applications make him an invaluable asset.

Working with Usman has been an amazing experience. His expertise in Tailwind CSS and creative web design has helped us build visually stunning and highly functional websites. He has a great eye for detail and ensures that every design is both modern and user-friendly. His ability to translate ideas into beautifully crafted digital experiences makes him a valuable asset. I highly recommend him for any role that requires a skilled and creative web developer.

I've seen Usman build an impressive mock entrance exam test platform, and his work truly stands out. His expertise in Supabase, advanced analytics, and AI integrationâ€”especially with Gemini 2.0â€”showcases his ability to create intelligent and data-driven applications. The way he approached problem-solving and innovation in this project was remarkable. His dedication to building cutting-edge solutions makes him an exceptional developer, and I highly recommend him for any role that requires expertise in AI-driven web applications.
